content: Hi there! I'm Matteo, I am relatively new to Rust and I love the language and the good vibes of its community. Some might say that I am an expert in numerical analysis, others might say that I am a musician; in the future maybe someone will say that I am a Rust contributor :wink:

Welcome @Matteo Briani! Have you seen https://nannou.cc/ before? It is a rust framework for creative-coding with support for audio: https://github.com/nannou-org/nannou/tree/master/nannou_audio As I have never used it myself, You will have to try for yourself to see if it is useful as I have never used it before.
Very interesting, I didn't know it! Thanks
